ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature

Class AbstractArrowShapeRealizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature.FeatureShapeRealizer
      • ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature.AbstractArrowShapeRealizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForwardArrow2ShapeRealizer, ForwardArrowShapeRealizer, ReverseArrow2ShapeRealizer, ReverseArrowShapeRealizer

    public abstract class AbstractArrowShapeRealizer
extends FeatureShapeRealizer
    An abstract class containing common code for making arrow shapes.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

      AbstractArrowShapeRealizer()

      Constructs an arrow shape realizer with the arrow head taking up the passed length.

      • realizeFeatureShape

        protected java.awt.Shape realizeFeatureShape(SlotPath path,
                                 Location trueLocation,
                                 double top,
                                 double bottom,
                                 int sequenceLength)
        Description copied from class: FeatureShapeRealizer
        Method to override to do the actual drawing. Parameters already checked for errors.
        Specified by:
        realizeFeatureShape in class FeatureShapeRealizer
        Parameters:
        path - The SlotPath where we should create the shape (this is modified).
        trueLocation - The actual location if the feature on the sequence.
        top - The top of this block (in the slot).
        bottom - The bottom of this block (in the slot).

      • createFirstBlock

        protected abstract void createFirstBlock(SlotPath path,
                    int start,
                    int stop,
                    double top,
                    double bottom,
                    int sequenceLength)
        Method to override to create the first block for non-contiguous regions.
        Parameters:
        path - The slot path to draw onto.
        start - The start base for this block.
        stop - The stop base for this block.
        top - The top height for this block, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).
        bottom - The bottom height for this block, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).
        sequenceLength - The sequence length.

      • createArrowBlock

        protected abstract void createArrowBlock(SlotPath path,
                    int start,
                    float center,
                    int stop,
                    double top,
                    double bottom)
        Method to override to create the arrow block part of the shape. (Arrow block is the part of the feature which has the arrow head attached).
        Parameters:
        path - The slot path to draw onto.
        start - The start base for this arrow block.
        center -
        stop - The stop base for this block.
        top - The top height for this block, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).
        bottom - The bottom height for this block, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).

      • createArrowHead

        protected abstract void createArrowHead(SlotPath path,
                   int start,
                   float center,
                   int stop,
                   double top,
                   double bottom)
        Method to override to create the arrow head part of the shape. (Arrow head is the part of the feature that is only the arrow head (displayed at low resolutions)).
        Parameters:
        path - The slot path to draw onto.
        start - The start base for this arrow head.
        center -
        stop - The stop base for this head.
        top - The top height for this head, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).
        bottom - The bottom height for this head, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).

      • createStandardBlock

        protected void createStandardBlock(SlotPath path,
                       int start,
                       int stop,
                       double top,
                       double bottom,
                       double heightDecrease)
        A convience method used to create a standard (no arrow heads etc) block.
        Parameters:
        path - The slot path to draw onto.
        start - The start based.
        stop - The stop base.
        top - The top height, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).
        bottom - The bottom height, (in range -1.0, to 1.0 defining bottom/top in slot).

      • getArrowLocation

        protected abstract Location getArrowLocation(Location fullLocation)
        A method used to determine which location would have the arrow.
        Parameters:
        fullLocation - The entire location.
        Returns:
        The arrow location, a single block location within the full location.
